SEARCH
Package domain

Class Maintenance

java.lang.Object
domain.Maintenance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Maintenance extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a maintenance operation on a machine. Includes details such as execution date, technician, reason, and status.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Maintenance

      Maintenance(Maintenance.Builder builder)
      Constructs a new Maintenance object with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      executionDate - the date of execution
      startDate - the start date and time
      endDate - the end date and time
      technician - the technician performing the maintenance
      reason - the reason for maintenance
      comments - any additional comments
      status - the maintenance status
      machine - the machine being maintained

  • Method Details

    • validateDates

      void validateDates()
      Validates that the end date is not before the start date. This method is automatically called before persisting or updating.
